★ Release Notes: 2021-09-27 ★
≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡≡

Thanks for upgrading to the latest version of the ALKS CLI!

* Fixes a bug with the ALKS CLI where it fails to run if the config folder doesn't already exist
* Re-adds support for the ALKS_DB environment variable for specifying a custom alks.db file location

Have feedback? https://github.com/Cox-Automotive/ALKS-CLI/issues
 
☁☁☁☁☁☁  Happy Clouding! ☁☁☁☁☁☁
